sling_bag.name: Sling Bag
sling_bag.effect: Can be worn with another bag. Max encumbrance: 3. This bag can be switched from being worn on your front or back for 1 AP. Searching and grabbing something from this bag is 5 AP.

stick_bag.name: Stick Bag
stick_bag.effect: Can be carried while wearing another bag. Stick must be held with one hand. Max encumbrance: 2 + STR.
